                      declname='a',
                      quals=[],

                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='b',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=

                      declname='b',
                      quals=[],

                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='add',
              quals=[],
              align=None,

                  names=['int'],
                )

    )
  body=

          expr=

              op='+',
              left=

                  name='a',

                )
            )
        )
    )
)
